description: Just by being born, Komilia proved how related the Humans and Zentradi are. The "first stellar interracial child" turns out to be quite an unabashed baby, resilient to http://anidb.net/ch10517 [Milia]`s unexperienced handling and playful with http://anidb.net/ch10506 [Max]`s hair. She plays a role in the U.N.` capture of a factory satellite in 2011 November.Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Komilia_Maria_Fallyna_Jenius
name: Komilia Maria Fallyna Jenius
